layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [color=#FFFFFF]
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x35 [bgcolor=#008000] [border: none (1px solid #000000) none]
        LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 408x18
            text run at (0,0) width 408: "This div should be 2em tall with a 1em gap underneath the text."
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,35) size 784x18 [bgcolor=#008000]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 406x18
          text run at (0,0) width 406: "I should also be green and flush with the other green div above."
